arts.ttl: Matchday thread: Fulham v Manchester United
arts.sum: Fulham’s first home game of the Premier League season is a mouthwatering clash against Manchester United. The Red Devils have won on their last eight visits to Craven Cottage and seemed to do everything but score in their defeat to Arsenal at Old Trafford last Sunday. Ruben Almorin’s reshaped front-line looks pretty frightening – especially […]

arts.ttl: Manchester United XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United travel to Craven Cottage on Sunday under significant early-season pressure to secure their first win of the campaign. While there were promising signs in the narrow 1-0 defeat to Arsenal, with new signings connecting well, the result has left Rúben Amorim’s side pointless. arts.ttl: Fulham vs Manchester United – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Fulham and Manchester United are both chasing their first win of the season as they meet at Craven Cottage on Sunday. Fulham began their campaign with a solid away draw at Brighton. In contrast, Manchester United are already under pressure after an opening-day defeat to Arsenal. arts.sum: Manchester United were defeated in their Premier League opener, while Fulham snatched a late draw at Brighton.

arts.ttl: Hojlund, Onana decisions made Man United 'confirm' squad for Fulham contest
arts.sum: Rasmus Hojlund has reportedly not travelled with the Manchester United squad to London for Sunday's Premier League clash with Fulham.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Manchester United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fulham welcome Manchester United to Craven Cottage on Sunday, with Marco Silva’s side aiming to build on a solid opening-day draw at Brighton. The manager has been handed a significant fitness boost ahead of the clash, but faces a key selection dilemma at left-back. arts.ttl: Marco Silva launches scathing critique of transfer activity before match against Man United
arts.sum: But the Red Devils have decisively outdone them in a window where the "club cannot be pleased at all." The Cottagers earned 54 points in the league for the first time last term, but only Benjamin Lecomte has entered the camp this summer.
